actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from May 22, 1986 to June 3, 1986, and for an adjournment of the Senate from May 21, 1986 to June 2, 1986.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from May 22, 1986, until June 3, 1986, and of the Senate from May 21, 1986, until June 2, 1986.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from May 22, 1986 to June 3, 1986, and for an adjournment of the Senate from May 21, 1986 to June 2, 1986.
